sense.def:
A goal
je prostor, v katerega igralci športnih iger, na primer nogometa ali hokeja, poskusijo spraviti žogo, da bi dosegli točko za svoje moštvo.

seg.quote: Robson completely missed his kick in front of the goal.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
goal
opišemo tudi primer, ko se igralcu posreči spraviti žogo v gol, in točko, ki jo s tem doseže.

seg.quote: It was his guile that gave Chelsea the decisive goal.

sense.def:
One's goal
je nekaj, kar upamo, da bomo dosegli.

seg.quote: ...their goal of landing a man on the moon.
